column2:
"In a somber world echoes a new sound
Further now, deeper down as we sink into twilight"

"The eternal winds will rush over you
As they usher you through your dreams
Bringing peace with you through the night..."

"Oh noble soul of highest virtue
Even if you lose everything"

"Let the light shine bright and swallow the night
Burn your flame 'til there's no sorrow"

"I'll weave your songs until I finally return with you to the land
Our unending prayers on you we bestow"

"'Til the day we reunite
These unending woven bonds will not fade"

"Deep and burning scars all have tales to tell
Resolute, always here to recall each endeavor"

"But these knowing scars will take time to heal
All the pain and suffering we braved"

"Though you're not alone
All the countless stars shining in the sky
Will consume their own selves until their light fades"

"I will praise your tears
Tears that you have shed day after new day"

"Life continues moving forward
Never looking back as we march on"
"We'll continue towards the future"

"Everlasting, shining radiance
Everything's covered by your glow"

"Manifest this pride you already know
You will guide us ever on"

"Oh, beyond time, we're serenaded by the songs woven through your soul
Our unending prayers on you we bestow"

"'Til the day we reunite
I will dedicate my song everyday"

"Oh noble soul of highest virtue
Even if you lose everything"

"Our far-reaching bonds we finally wove
Summon countless miracles"
"Rest your weary eyes in eternal lands"

"I will not forget these sobering days
When we fought through the night
'Til we witnessed the sunlight"

"The eternal winds will shepherd you now
To the place where we will return"
"May you dream of the peace you've earned..."
"Song of Mourning ~The Beginning Wind~"
"Nadereh"
